name: Spotless icons preview
description:
In an ocean of icons, I discovered uncharted waters. So, I built Spotless—icons with an artisanal balance between lines and fills, and a hint of 3D.


Spotless is built for brands where iconography is key to their brand messaging. Each icon is designed on a shared visual language, such as consistent angles, curves, optical weight, and a meaningful ratio between lines and fills. Their character is a well-balanced approach between a serious and casual tone for brands that want to sound stable and reliable but also be friendly and approachable.


・— ✦ —・


This is a presale


I aim to craft at least 500 icons over the next few months, imbuing spirit in each of them without sacrificing quality. Once completed, the price will be $100.


But if you want to be among the first 20 early supporters, you‘ll get the first 100 icons for $20 and the remaining 400 for free, including all future updates, forever.


If, however, this is too early for you, no rush. Once I reach the 200 icons milestone, I‘ll announce another presale, for $40. Just make sure you leave your email to be notified.
